ru: Сохраняя поднятые стопы и колени, руки вытяните вдоль туловища ладонями вверх.

en: Interlock your palms together, really making sure they're snug and secure.
enSynonyms: Clasp your hands firmly, just to get that nice, solid connection.
Intertwine your fingers securely, feeling the strength in your grip.
Join your palms in a firm grip, ensuring every finger is perfectly aligned.
Lock your hands into a unified position, creating a stable base for your posture.
Weave your fingers together with purpose, focusing on how each digit fits into place.
